articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built General Satellite Control and Command Centre
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Newly-built General Satellite Control and Command Centre
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army (KPA), inspected the newly-built General Satellite Control and Command Centre of the National Aerospace Development Administration (NADA).
					 The successful construction of the centre as a monumental edifice in the era of the Workers' Party provided a solid springboard for continued launch of various working satellites essential for the country's sci-tech and economic development and national defence.
					
					 Commanding a panoramic view of the centre with a broad smile on his face, Kim Jong Un said with great pleasure that it is a splendid edifice, fresh and peculiar in style.
					
					He went to the room for the education in the revolutionary history at the centre. The great Generalissimo Kim Jong Il is a peerless patriot who ushered in the new history of space development and brought about the greatest event of satellite launch in the Korean nation's history of 5,000 years, he said, adding: We should dynamically conduct a drive of breaking through the cutting edge with intense loyalty and noble sense of moral obligation to further glorify the DPRK as a space power and thus hand down the undying feats of the Generalissimo to posterity.
					
					 Then he went round different parts of the centre to learn in detail about its construction.
					
					 He noted that the main room for real-time display of satellite launch, auxiliary display and control room and optical observation room were splendidly built to meet the scientific and technological requirements and the visitor's room is very convenient to watching satellite launch.
					
					 E-library, lounge, conference room, offices, dinning room and bedrooms are well built to provide the scientists and technicians with enough conditions for their research and living, he said.
					
					 He called for putting all the facilities of the centre on a more scientific and modern basis and preferentially treating the space developers and taking warm care of their work and life in order to fully ensure the manufacture, launch and control of working satellites.
					
					 He stressed the need to provide more cutting-edge facilities for the centre, build a base in which satellite test can be done in the same circumstances with outer space and erect something symbolic of the centre.
					
					 The site of the centre is not so high above sea level but it is the most dominant in the world as it comprehensively represents the dignity of the Korean nation, he said.
					
					 He gave thanks in the name of the KPA supreme commander to the servicepersons of KPA Unit 963 for having successfully built the center.
					
					 The DPRK has developed into a full-fledged satellite manufacturer and launcher, he noted, saying: Peaceful space development is an option taken by our Party and people and a legitimate right of Songun Korea.
					
					 The status of the DPRK as a satellite producer-launcher remains unchanged though the hostile forces deny it and its space development can never be abandoned, no matter who may oppose, he said.
					
					 Satellites of Juche Korea will as ever be launched into outer space at the time and locations set by the Party Central Committee, he added.
					
					 He expressed great expectation and belief that the scientists and technicians of the NADA would bring about a fresh turn in space scientific research and satellite launch.

articles.title: Greetings to Polish FM
articles.content:
Greetings to Polish FM
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong sent a message of greeting to Grzegorz Schetyna, foreign minister of Poland, on Sunday on the occasion of its national day.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the two countries would develop on good terms in the mutual interests of the two peoples, wishing the Polish foreign minister success in his work for the development of the country's foreign relations.

articles.title: DPRK Premier Inspects Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
DPRK Premier Inspects Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Pyongyang Children's Foodstuff Factory being renovated.
					 Going round various places of the project, he underlined the need to put all production processes on an automated, unmanned, germ-free and dust-free basis. He also stressed the need to improve the quality of the project and urged relevant units to satisfactorily provide necessary building materials.
					
					 The premier went to the Nampho Glassware Branch of the Taean Friendship Glass Factory. He called for keeping production going at a high rate to meet the increasing demand of the people, true to the behests of leader Kim Jong Il, and thus make a positive contribution to improving their standard of living.

articles.title: 15th May 21 Architectural Festival, 10th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
articles.content:
15th May 21 Architectural Festival, 10th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The 15th May 21 Architectural Festival and the 10th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics will be held here from May 12 to 15 on the occasion of the anniversary of publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "Theory of Architectural Art".
					 The festival and symposium under the theme of "Architecture of Loving People and Younger Generation" will bring together officials and other people of architectural designing, building, building materials, supervision, scientific researches and educational institutions and relevant units across the country.
					
					 Published at the festival will be scientific papers selected in the provincial festivals. Displayed there will be architectural designing layouts and programs, multi-media and building materials. 
					
					 The symposium will prove scientifically and theoretically the fact that model structures have been built to meet the needs of a highly civilized socialist nation under the wise guidance of the party. It will also discuss the issues arising in developing the Juche-based architecture as required by the party's policy.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Confronting with Compatriots
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses S. Korea of Confronting with Compatriots
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The "Saenuri Party" and the south Korean authorities at a recent party-government consultative meeting were closeted to revise some details of the "bill on human rights in the north" and designate it as an agenda item to be swiftly passed through the 19th-term "National Assembly". It is said that if the "bill" is designated as the above-said agenda item, it will be brought for discussion at the NA session automatically though the opposition parties are opposed to it.
					Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Sunday says that the puppet conservative forces including the "Saenuri Party" have made desperate efforts to pass the "bill" through the NA for ten years.
					
					Such madcap racket is an unpardonable challenge to the dignified socialist system in the DPRK and a heinous provocation totally bedeviling the inter-Korea relations, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					It is clear to everyone that the reckless moves of the puppet forces to put greater spurs to "unification of social system" while totally denying the idea and social system in the DPRK will foster distrust and confrontation between the north and the south and finally bring about a war.
					
					Their reckless moves are making the DPRK realize once again that they have remained unchanged in their sinister intention for confrontation and it will never change. 
					
					It is nonsensical to sit at the negotiating table with the confrontational maniacs dreaming to bring down the sovereignty of the DPRK and its socialist system, indifferent to the destiny of the nation and prospect of inter-Korean relations.
					
					The south Korean puppet forces will be held accountable for the catastrophic consequences entailed by their reckless moves.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Brazilian Body
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Praised by Brazilian Body
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- The Brazilian Committee for Remembering Leader Kim Jong Il posted on its website a special write-up on April 22 illustrated with a portrait of smiling President Kim Il Sung on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 In an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, distinguished great man in 20th century" the website said that he, who embarked on the road of revolution in his early years, founded the immortal Juche idea to open up a new era of independence when the popular masses became the master of their destiny and history for the first time in the history of human thought.
					
					 He worked heart and soul to reunify Korea, the article noted, and went on:
					
					 He advanced the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo, providing the basic cornerstone for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The document examined by him and on which he left his historic autograph during the last period of his great life was the one for Korea's reunification.
					
					 The article noted that he was awarded gifts, orders, medals and honorary titles from governments, political parties and organizations of many countries, international and regional bodies and figures of all social standings, and streets, organizations and institutions which go by his august name are increasing day by day.

articles.title: KPA Founding Anniversary Marked in Germany, Guinea
articles.content:
KPA Founding Anniversary Marked in Germany, Guinea
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Round-table talks took place in Germany and a lecture and film show in Guinea on April 23 and 24 on the occasion of the 83rd founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 Participants of the film show watched Korean film "Korean People's Army, Steel-strong Ranks."
					
					 The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany said that President Kim Il Sung was an invincible and iron-willed brilliant commander who defeated the Japanese imperialists to liberate the country and beat back the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il developed the KPA into the matchless revolutionary armed forces with his Songun politics, true to the intention of the President, he noted, adding:
					
					 The might of the KPA has been further consolidated thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 An official of a Guinean company in a lecture said that the Korean-style socialism is invincible thanks to the KPA.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the round-table talks held in Germany.

articles.title: KPA Founding Anniversary Celebrated by Bodies of Brazil, Nigeria
articles.content:
KPA Founding Anniversary Celebrated by Bodies of Brazil, Nigeria
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Brazilian and Nigerian organizations posted special write-ups on their websites on April 20 and 24 to mark the 83rd founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					The Brazilian Committee for Solidarity with the DPRK posted an article illustrated with a photo documenting the Songun leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					The article titled "Undying army-building exploits of President Kim Il Sung and HE Kim Jong Il" said:
					
					Under the wise leadership of the President the Korean People's Revolutionary Army beat down the Japanese imperialists, achieved the historic cause of national liberation and developed into the KPA, the regular revolutionary armed forces.
					
					He strengthened the KPA into a-match-for-a-hundred combat ranks and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence.
					
					The KPA upheld HE Kim Jong Il, another Songun brilliant commander of Mt. Paektu, as its supreme commander in the early 1990s.
					
					The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "80 odd years under Songun brilliant commanders".
					
					The article introduced the glorious history of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army which had emerged victorious under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: KPA Founding Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
articles.content:
KPA Founding Anniversary Marked by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, May 3 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and radio broadcasting services carried special write-ups and aired special programs to mark the 83rd founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The Lao paper Congtap Pasason Lao on April 24 edited an article titled "Songun brilliant commander and socialist Korea" illustrated with a photo dealing with revolutionary activities of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He resolutely shattered the ever more undisguised moves of the U.S. imperialists and their followers to stifle the DPRK with his ever-changing military stratagem and distinguished commanding art, the paper said.
					
					 The Indian paper Voice of Million on the same day carried an article titled "Songun Korea".
					
					 President Kim Il Sung who pioneered the Songun revolution put an end to the Korean nation's history of distress, the article said, and continued:
					
					 The cause of Songun was successfully carried forward by HE Kim Jong Il. He ceaselessly inspected KPA units to firmly prepare soldiers to be ones strong in idea and faith, directed primary efforts to developing the defence industry to consolidate the overall defence capabilities of the country in every way and turned the whole country into an impregnable fortress.
					
					 Korean socialism is sure to be victorious thanks to Kim Jong Un who is identical to Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Guinean domestic and international broadcasting services and Seven National Languages Broadcasting Service on April 23 introduced the indestructible might of the powerful Paektusan revolutionary army which regards it as its primary mission to devotedly defend the leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recorre nuevo centro de control general de satelites
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recorre nuevo centro de control general de satelites
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, recorrio el Centro de Control General de Satelites de la Administracion Nacional de Desarrollo Espacial, nuevamente construido.
					Al levantarse el centro como creacion monumental de la epoca del Partido del Trabajo, se ha preparado un firme trampolin para seguir lanzando con exito los satelites de  uso practico indispensables al desarrollo de ciencias, tecnicas y de la economia y la defensa estatal del pais.
					
					Contemplando sonriente el panorama del centro, el Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho diciendo que se levanto una edificacion vistosa, peculiar y de nueva forma.
					
					El Mariscal estuvo primero en la sala de educacion en la historia revolucionaria.
					
					Senalo que el Dirigente Kim Jong Il fue patriota sin igual quien abrio una nueva historia del desarrollo espacial y asi trajo un acontecimiento especial en la historia nacional de 5 milenios de lanzar el satelite artificial de la Tierra.
					
					Destaco la necesidad de transmitir para siempre las inmortales hazanas del Dirigente al esforzarse con tesonero por conquistar las ciencias de punta y glorificar la patria como potencia espacial con la sincera fidelidad y la noble obligacion moral.
					
					Pasando revista a varios puntos del centro, el Mariscal estudio detalladamente del estado de construccion.
					
					Subrayo que se construyeron maravillosamente conforme a la demanda cientifico-tecnica la sala principal para la demostracion en el tiempo real del lanzamiento de satelite, la sala de muestra auxiliar y control y la otra de observacion optica. Anadio que la sala de visitantes es muy conveniente para ver el lanzamiento de satelite.
					
					Prosiguio que se levantaron bien la biblioteca electronica, la sala de espera, la sala de reunion, las oficinas, comedores y las habitaciones para asegurar la suficiente condicion de investigacion y de vida a los cientificos y tecnicos.
					
					Para realizar con satisfaccion la fabricacion, el lanzamiento y el control de satelite artificial, es preciso cientifizar y modernizar en la etapa mas alta todas las instalaciones y al mismo tiempo presentar activamente a los desarrolladores espaciales y atender bien sus labores y vidas, ordeno.
					
					Instruyo enviar mas al centro las instalaciones sofisticadas, construir la base de ensayo de ambiente espacial que posibilitara realizar la prueba de satelites en la condicion igual al cosmos y erguir el objeto simbolico del centro.
					
					No es elevada la altura sobre el nivel del mar de donde se halla el centro, pero el lugar es mas alto en el mundo en el sentido de que representa tal como es la dignidad de la nacion  coreana, asevero.
					
					Dio agradecimiento del Comandante Supremo del EPC a los constructores militares de la unidad 963 del EPC quienes lo levantaron con excelencia.
					
					Hoy dia, la RPDC se ha convertido en un estado que fabrica y lanza por su propia cuenta los satelites artificiales, recalco y asevero que el desarrollo espacial con fines pacificos es el camino optado por nuestro partido y pueblo y el derecho legitimo de la Corea del Songun.
					
					Recalco que nunca se cambiara la posicion de la RPDC como productora y lanzadora de satelites aunque las fuerzas hostiles se desesperen para negarla. Reitero que la labor de desarrollo espacial no es un trabajo renunciable segun la oposicion de alguien.
					
					Enfatizo que los satelites de la Corea del Juche seguiran lanzandose al cosmos en el tiempo y lugar que decida el Comite Central del PTC.
					
					Manifesto gran esperanza y conviccion de que los cientificos y tecnicos de la administracion registren nuevo cambio en la investigacion de ciencias espaciales y el lanzamiento de satelites.

articles.title: Tendra lugar en RPDC gran marcha internacional de mujeres
articles.content:
Tendra lugar en RPDC gran marcha internacional de mujeres
Pyongyang, 3 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tendra lugar en el mes en curso la "Gran marcha internacional de mujeres para la reunificacion y paz de Corea 2015".
					Al respecto, varias entidades sociales de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, inclusive el comite coreano de solidaridad con los pueblos del mundo, organizaron en esta capital el comite preparatorio y actuan para llevarla al exito.
					
					La marcha contribuira a estimular la lucha del pueblo coreano por abrir ancho camino de reunificacion independiente con motivo del septuagesimo aniversario de la liberacion de Corea y alzar las voces de la sociedad internacional aspirante a la reintegracion y la paz de la Peninsula Coreana.
